General.Name: Kali Inc
General.Description: Kali, Inc., doing business as Kali-Extracts, Inc., engages in the research and development of cannabis treatments for various illnesses, diseases, and chronic pain as a symptom of various diagnoses. It provides pharmaceuticals, cannabis extracts, and health and wellness products. The company was formerly known as VLOV Inc. and changed its name to Kali, Inc. in February 2016. Kali, Inc. is based in Dallas, Texas.
General.Address: 8300 Douglas Avenue, Dallas, TX, United States, 75225
